title: The Lost Boys: Simmons and Evenepoel, a tale of two prodigies
content:
Throughout this Tour de France, longtime cycling journalist John Wilcockson is writing about the riders who have to abandon the race: The Lost Boys. Today, he looks at the abandonment of American national champion Quinn Simmons. Ever since Quinn Simmons won the 2019 world junior road championship in Yorkshire, England—taking over the under-19s rainbow jersey … Continued

Read the full article at The Lost Boys: Simmons and Evenepoel, a tale of two prodigies on Velo.
author: sstokes
